title: heading role
description: A heading for a section of the page.

assertions.title: The screen reader MUST convey the heading role
assertions.rationale: The user needs to know that the element describes the following content.
examples: When applied to a heading, the heading might be announced as something like "<accessible name> heading level 2"

assertions.title: The screen reader MUST convey the accessible name of the heading
assertions.rationale: The user needs to know the content of the heading.
examples: When applied to a heading, the heading might be announced as something like "<accessible name> heading level 2"

assertions.title: The screen reader SHOULD provide shortcuts to jump to headings
assertions.rationale: Headings provide an outline of the page and users need to be able to quickly navigate to different sections of the page.
